item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Last updated on February 4, 2022. Any outdoor activity, especially those in the mountains, inherently possesses risks which may lead to severe injury or death. This website is not meant to serve as an educational guide or be a substitute for proper alpine training, but rather a general informational reference. It is your own responsibility to acquire the necessary training and expertise to ensure the safety of yourself and others while in the mountains.
